name: [First Project] Top Down Shooter
description:
Music: X-Ray by Zizibum

Objective:

Survive as long as possible (3 lives) while scoring points.

Controls:

WASD Key (recommended) or Arrow Keys to Move

Mouse To Target and Left Mouse to Shoot

Pickups

Storm - Spawns a torrent of bullets from right to left destroying enemies (5 secs)

Shield - Spawns a shield around the player which destroys enemies on contact (5 secs)

Enemies

Normal - Moves towards the player, dies when touching the player or bullet.

Ranged - Moves towards the player, stops at a certain distance and starts shooting bullets that only damage the player. Dies when touching the player or player's bullet, the bullet dies when touching the player or player's bullet.
